channel.title: Virus buster
channel.description:
one day some anoying ideot decided to make a new virus protection. little did he know that there where hacking froobs out there. 2 hours ago a boy named chrishead168 got a stupid virus buster pop up and it started to download it for no reason. in less that 5 seconds his computer was infected with the most anoying porno popup and warning popup virus in the universe.
did you enjoy my story?
of course its based on me and has atually just happened on my brand new computer than i have been setting up for the last 2 days. right this second i am on my old computer.
the moral of this is to get people to post in general how to get rid of the virus busted virus.

item.title: Virus buster
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Thabest:

Get ad-aware pro from Ron’s get free programs thread in the tips, tricks, and tutorials section.

I’d recommend that too.

Read full topic
